net.sf.clickclick.control.breadcrumb
Class Breadcrumb

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.click.control.AbstractControl
      net.sf.clickclick.control.breadcrumb.Breadcrumb
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.apache.click.Control
public class Breadcrumb
extends org.apache.click.control.AbstractControl

Provides a history bar, sometimes referred to as a breadcrumb.

The Breadcrumb records all pages a user visits and builds up a trail so one can navigate back to previous pages.

Please note there are different ways to implement a breadcrumb. The following article outlines a different approach than what was taken here: http://www.useit.com/alertbox/breadcrumbs.html.

See Also:
Serialized Form

onInit

public void onInit()
The onInit event handler performs the following operations:
  • Invokes restoreState(org.apache.click.Context) to retrieve the stored Trail instance between requests.
  • Stores the path of the parent Page in the Trail instance.

Specified by:
onInit in interface org.apache.click.Control
Overrides:

label - the label to render for the given path

Parameters:

Returns:

collapseTrail

protected void collapseTrail(java.lang.String newPath)
This method ensures that when a user navigates to a URL that is already present in the breadcrumb trail, all entries after this path is removed.

Parameters:
newPath - the current URL path

restoreState

protected void restoreState(org.apache.click.Context context)
Retrieves the breadcrumb trail from the HttpSession. The trail is retrieved from the HttpSession with the key BREADCRUMB_KEY.

Parameters:
context - the current request context

saveState

protected void saveState(org.apache.click.Context context)
Stores the breadcrumb trail in the HttpSession. The trail is stored in the HttpSession under the key BREADCRUMB_KEY.

Parameters:
context - the current request context
